discussion_comments.comment_body:
<!-- metadata:{"confidence":10,"steps":[]} -->
Replacing the icon font-family with 'Inter', serif may break icon rendering, as icon classes typically require a dedicated icon font (e.g., 'element-icons').

```suggestion
	font-family: 'element-icons' !important;
```

<!-- metadata:{"confidence":9,"steps":[]} -->
Changing the font-family from an icon font ('element-icons') to a text font ('Inter', serif) may break the display of the icon specified by content: '\e6da'; unless 'Inter' is a custom icon font with this glyph, the icon will not render as intended.

```suggestion
               font-family: 'element-icons';
```
